categories.body: Avatar: The Last Airbender episode transcripts

paragraphs.body: The scene returns to the forest.
paragraphs.text: The scene returns to the forest.

paragraphs.body: Cut back to Senlin, near sunset. Aang steps outside the center building and awaits the Hei Bai.
paragraphs.text: Cut back to Senlin, near sunset. Aang steps outside the center building and awaits the Hei Bai.

paragraphs.body: A couple of hours later, Aang awakens.
paragraphs.text: A couple of hours later, Aang awakens.

paragraphs.body: Cut back to Aang and Fang. Fang takes him to a temple on an unknown island. He flies into the temple and toward the roof.
paragraphs.text: Cut back to Aang and Fang. Fang takes him to a temple on an unknown island. He flies into the temple and toward the roof.

paragraphs.body: Meanwhile, Katara is flying on Appa over the forest.
paragraphs.text: Meanwhile, Katara is flying on Appa over the forest.

paragraphs.body: Cut to the village, sunset. Katara stands outside the center building and notices Aang's return. Aang lands and Katara runs to him.
paragraphs.text: Cut to the village, sunset. Katara stands outside the center building and notices Aang's return. Aang lands and Katara runs to him.

paragraphs.body: Back to Iroh, who is surrounded by the soldiers.
paragraphs.text: Back to Iroh, who is surrounded by the soldiers.
